about.details:
Pritika Engineering Components Limited is engaged in the business of manufacturing of precision machined components primarily for the automotive industry, especially for tractors, trucks, and other commercial vehicles, etc. The company manufactures various Tractors & Automobile components like End Covers, Cover Sealed Brakes, Differential Cases, Cover Hydraulic Lift, Cover Transcase, Front Wheel hubs, Fly Wheel Housing, Rear Axle Casings, Hydraulic Lift Covers, Brake Housing & Front Engine Supports etc.

Pritika Engineering manufactures customized products for tractors, commercial vehicles & other construction equipment, etc which are supplied to Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) directly/through the group companies.

The company was previously listed on Calcutta Stock Exchange and the same was directly listed on the Bombay stock exchange dated October 01, 2015.

Pritika Engineering Components Limited's manufacturing unit is located in Punjab. The company's clients include Ashok Leyland, Eicher, Mahindra, Tafe, and Swaraj, among others.

The total revenue for the year 2021-22 is Rs 5,739.58 lakhs. Pritika Engineering Components Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of Pritika Auto Industries Limited.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Quality standards.
  • Experienced and professional management team.
  • Wide product range and product segments.
  • Legacy Business Process & Management.
  • Strong & experienced R&D team.

faqs.question: What is the Pritika Engineering Components IPO?
faqs.answer:
Pritika Engineering Components IPO is a SME IPO of 3248000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.42 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹29 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on November 25, 2022, and closes on November 30, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Pritika Engineering Components IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Pritika Engineering Components IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Pritika Engineering Components IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Pritika Engineering Components IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Pritika Engineering Components IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Pritika Engineering Components IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Pritika Engineering Components IPO opens on November 25, 2022 and closes on November 30, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Pritika Engineering Components IPO?
faqs.answer: Pritika Engineering Components IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,16,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Pritika Engineering Components IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Pritika Engineering Components IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Pritika Engineering Components IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Pritika Engineering Components IPO will be done on Monday, December 5, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, December 7, 2022. Check the Pritika Engineering Components IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Pritika Engineering Components IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Pritika Engineering Components IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 8, 2022.
